description: Ensure navigation and focus order remain predictable and offer multiple ways to locate pages.
recommendation: Keep focus order logical, offer multiple navigation paths, and label destinations consistently. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.4.3,2.4.5,3.2.3,3.2.4)
algorithm: Checks for positive tabindex, inconsistent repeated nav link order, inconsistent labels for the same href, or missing navigation/search/sitemap cues.
algorithm_advanced: Flags positive tabindex values, mismatched nav link sequences across nav regions, inconsistent labels for same href, or absence of nav/search/sitemap cues.
